            5年前端刚会用vscode debug vue项目
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-name" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><a href="/user/2629687546491928/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="">
    世界哪有真情
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><time datetime="2024-12-10T05:04:03.000Z" title="Tue Dec 10 2024 05:04:03 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-7cdd11fb="">
                    2024-12-10
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-7cdd11fb="">

                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path></svg>
                    阅读3分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><p>说真的，做了5年前端我也换过几家公司</p>
<p>我发现我的前端同事都不会debug，都是用的console.log，那我也不学</p>
<blockquote>
<p>这里说的是在vscode里debug，不是代码里写debugger后用浏览器调试</p>
</blockquote>
<p>反正console也能勉强用</p>
<p>反正前端大多时候也不怎么写复杂的业务逻辑</p>
<p>就算写 那我就多console几下，到时候一起删了好了</p>
<p>就这样，我console了5年。。。</p>
<p>期间中途也有忍不住的时候，但是我还是忍了。</p>
<p>直到今天，又接手到这种代码，然后又是在一个加班的夜里，我忍不了了，死活我都要学会用vscode调试vue项目。</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a1153e6c9e604749b432ec10e2171ad2~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=ksiopMjpaahjhicg4jfEHm%2BVq4A%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-0">debug有那么方便吗</h3>
<p>这么说吧，100个后端开发，100个都必须会debug，连项目启动都规定只能用debug模式启动，方便调试。</p>
<p>因为业务逻辑复杂的地方，你不debug，就不知道代码的走向，去到哪个作用域你都不知道，你一个个console，每个作用域都写一遍吗，然后去比对先执行的哪个console?</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">正片开始</h3>
<blockquote>
<p>灰常简单，3步搞定</p>
</blockquote>
<h4 data-id="heading-2">1. 开启sourcemap</h4>
<p>vue.config.js文件中，添加如下配置:</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-attr">configureWebpack</span>: {
   <span class="hljs-attr">devtool</span>: process.<span class="hljs-property">env</span>.<span class="hljs-property">NODE_ENV</span> !== <span class="hljs-string">"production"</span> ? <span class="hljs-string">"source-map"</span> : <span class="hljs-string">''</span>,
 }
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>原理：暴露未编译前的目录结构，使程序能够精确定位代码断点位置（大概这个意思）</p>
</blockquote>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">2.启动项目 记录下访问端口</h4>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/331714c7aa884dc3bc30ed361ca45310~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=9fWF6R7eWYKKrex8Zeo4MuTNkT0%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-4">3.新建debug配置</h4>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/86326baf2c2749ad8afea5a86f81a6ab~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=IAcW6FwtmMJFGl3cJusxJUkl2xk%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/8bb27bb649384b8a93fa8ba60c284fa8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=cNEQzmZpgYuuw2QuaTJplUWEXbw%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js">{
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 使用 IntelliSense 了解相关属性。</span>
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 悬停以查看现有属性的描述。</span>
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 欲了解更多信息，请访问: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=830387</span>
  <span class="hljs-string">"version"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"0.2.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">"configurations"</span>: [
    {
      <span class="hljs-string">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Launch Edge"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"request"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"launch"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"msedge"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"http://localhost:8081"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"webRoot"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"${workspaceFolder}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-string">"sourceMapPathOverrides"</span>: {
        <span class="hljs-string">"webpack:///src/*"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"${workspaceFolder}/src/*"</span>
      }
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2e4ab02f2f5d408ab84391679307a042~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=i3U77wrYAj289A%2Fl9%2B6DWDCQjhI%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>切记，要用debug这里启动后弹出的浏览器窗口进行操作调试，这是个单独的浏览器窗口</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">调试操作</h3>
<p>在上述通过debug打开的浏览器中操作你的项目</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/89978745c0c9455bab5caf1efd5e21cb~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=Zrtq3tZl3maVJpgWpxvFljnV3Yc%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy">
需要在哪调试就在哪打断点</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/acedb9385b0b47f2b2c9377146846566~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=OeBeu7GPl7xMPKo9hbkxwQ%2FhJgk%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy">
断点有普通断点和条件断点（用于比如循环操作时 当变量为什么条件时激活断点，避免一次一次点断点执行循环）</p>
<p>当执行到你打端点的代码时，程序就会暂停，并且输出当前执行状态的所有信息了</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b6ce8e6cbfd74e688d00b2d5f3cfd889~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=rx6aP1tk0SQAsTi9dtOeQ25g43M%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy">
大家看图应该都能看懂，我就不多说了，下面主要讲一下断点的操作</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e345deaa27b540ab975613dece055af5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=sznSzAySALPWFXAwQpdJl0McvVo%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/277721236063460c9cfc528f1e53eeb8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=SCzLyK33rp8X7gEtC23Bej8385I%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"> 用于从当前断点跳到下一个断点（没有下一个断点程序就执行结束）</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/58a2338111594da7a920e357f974b33e~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=39SXWOmhD8CKM%2F7q9xjHXo%2BvdZ4%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy">一行一行的往下执行</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/420c64e918554651a30dfb072662d0ef~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5LiW55WM5ZOq5pyJ55yf5oOF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738624464&amp;x-signature=TlO0OXUndsjqe8yIkdOnH%2Fn0QkU%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy">执行到方法时，点击第一个会进入方法里面去，点击第二个会退出方法栈</p>
<p>最后当你关闭通过调试打开的浏览器窗口时，vscode里的调试也就结束了。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">总结</h3>
<blockquote>
<p>这样比console方便多了吧，点一下就知道这行程序的前后所有变量的状态以及接下来的走动</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>也许这些东西很简单很基础，但是也总有人不会的，那就存在分享的意义</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>好了，不多说了，就午休时间分享一下，我要睡午觉了</p>
</blockquote></div></div>
